title: Disable ValidateExecutableReferences
body: This works around an odd misconfiguration in the internal 1ES 2022 pools that they use the latest .NET SDK but a preview VS/MSBuild.

commit.message:
Disable ValidateExecutableReferences

This works around an odd misconfiguration in the internal 1ES 2022 pools that they use the latest .NET SDK but a preview VS/MSBuild.

nodes.body: Bypassing PR check since the official build is broken and this passed a couple of legs.
